MemberSignature.Value: public AzureSqlContainer (string friendlyName = null, Nullable<Microsoft.Azure.Management.RecoveryServices.Backup.Models.BackupManagementType> backupManagementType = null, string registrationStatus = null, string healthStatus = null, string containerType = null);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string friendlyName, valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype Microsoft.Azure.Management.RecoveryServices.Backup.Models.BackupManagementType> backupManagementType, string registrationStatus, string healthStatus, string containerType) cil managed

Docs.param: Type of backup managemenent for the container. Possible values include: 'Invalid', 'AzureIaasVM', 'MAB', 'DPM', 'AzureBackupServer', 'AzureSql'
Status of registration of the container with the Recovery Services Vault.
Status of health of the container.

Type of the container. The value of this property for: 1. Compute Azure VM is Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines 2. Classic Compute Azure VM is Microsoft.ClassicCompute/virtualMachines 3. Windows machines (like MAB, DPM etc) is Windows 4. Azure SQL instance is AzureSqlContainer.
